com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.collections.synchronization

Interface ISynchronizationController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SynchronizationController

    public interface ISynchronizationController
    An instance of this interface is used by the HA sub-system to manage the synchronization of the local node with the rest of the cluster.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSynchronizationListener(ISynchronizationListener listener)
      Registers a listener to be notified when the synchronization state changes.
      boolean isStarted()
      Tells whether the synchronization controller is currently started.
      boolean isSynchronized() 
      void removeSynchronizationListener(ISynchronizationListener listener)
      Unregisters a synchronization listener.
      void start()
      Starts the synchronization controller.
      void stop()
      Stops the state machine.
      void synchronize()
      Forces a synchronization to happen.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
    throws IllegalStateException
        Starts the synchronization controller.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the synchronization controller was already started

      • stop

        void stop()
   throws IllegalStateException
        Stops the state machine.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the synchronization controller was already stopped

      • isStarted

        boolean isStarted()
        Tells whether the synchronization controller is currently started.
        Returns:
        true iff. the synchronization controller is currently started

      • isSynchronized

        boolean isSynchronized()
        Returns:
        true iff. the local cluster node is currently synchronized with the the rest of the cluster

      • synchronize

        void synchronize()
          throws IllegalStateException
        Forces a synchronization to happen. If a synchronization is currently in progress, causes it to start over. If the local node is currently in the synchronized state, causes a new synchronization attempt to start.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the synchronization controller is not started

      • addSynchronizationListener

        void addSynchronizationListener(ISynchronizationListener listener)
                         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Registers a listener to be notified when the synchronization state changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if listener is already registered

      • removeSynchronizationListener

        void removeSynchronizationListener(ISynchronizationListener listener)
                            throws IllegalArgumentException
        Unregisters a synchronization listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to unregister
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if listener is not registered
